alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Middlesex; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ocean, Monmouth and eastern Middlesex Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 846 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greenwood Lake to Tuckerton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Perth Amboy, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Sandy Hook, Lakewood, Middletown, Old Bridge, Jackson, Howell, Sayreville, Marlboro, Carteret, Barnegat, Tinton Falls, Holmdel, Red Bank, Beachwood, Matawan and Manasquan. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 12. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 21 and 34. Interstate 287 in New Jersey near mile marker 0. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 58 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Middlesex; Ocean; Western Monmouth
